title: Workflow Run
description: Schema for submitting metadata on the executation of a computational analysis workflow run.

title.title: Title
title.description: The preferred viewable name of the run of the workflow.

description.title: Description
description.description: A plain text description of the task.

metadata_only.title: File Provenance Graph
metadata_only.description: When True the file provenance graph was generated without a run of a 4dn-dcic pipeline.

description_only.title: File Provenance Graph
description_only.description: When True the file provenance graph was generated without a run of a 4dn-dcic pipeline.

input_files.title: Input files
input_files.description: The files used as initial input for the workflow.

items.title: Input file mapping
items.description: Info on file used as input and mapping to CWL argument for the workflow.

workflow_argument_name.title: Workflow argument name
workflow_argument_name.description: the name of the argument of the workflow that corresponds to the input file

ordinal.title: Ordinal
ordinal.description: Ordinal of the file in the argument

format_if_extra.title: Format of extra file
format_if_extra.description: the file format if the input file is an extra file of a file object

output_files.title: Output files
output_files.description: All files that are saved as output of the workflow

items.title: Output file mapping
items.description: Info on file output by the workflow and how it is mapped to CWL arguments.

workflow_argument_name.title: Workflow argument name
workflow_argument_name.description: Argument name of node in workflow that corresponds to the output file

output_quality_metrics.title: Output quality metrics
output_quality_metrics.description: All quality metric objects that are outputs of the workflow run

workflow_argument_name.title: Workflow argument name
workflow_argument_name.description: Argument name of node in workflow that corresponds to the output file

workflow_argument_name.title: Workflow argument name
workflow_argument_name.description: the name of the argument of the workflow that corresponds to the parameter

value.title: Value
value.description: a specified value for the specified parameter as used in a task

software_parameter.title: Parameter name
software_parameter.description: the name or flag of the parameter as passed to the software

ordinal.title: Ordinal
ordinal.description: Ordinal of the parameter in the argument

app_name.title: AppName
app_name.description: The name of the App used by the workflow.

commands.title: Run Commands
commands.description: list of commands run for the workflow, simplified

items.title: Commands
items.description: one of the commands that are run for the workflow run
